name: 3Head
description: Basic Attack changes into 3 directions for 16s. On hit, earn 1 stack. Damage to foes +100%. Damage to Challenge or lower monsters +400%.

name: Mayhem
description: For 30s, Atk. Speed +3% for 4s every time skills are used, up to 15%.

name: Twisted Fate
description: For 4s, your skill Damage either stays the same or increases by 40%.

name: Corrosion
effects: Chance of debuff for increased damage
description: For 30s, gain a 30% chance of +10% Damage to the foe for 5s.

name: Ghost
description: Ignore collision with monsters. Move Speed +20% and Damage from foes -50% for 3 hits for 16s.

name: Cull
effects: Increased crit chance and crit damage
description: For 4s, Crit Rate for all skill attacks 100% and Crit Damage +50% when they hit 1 foe.

name: Balance
description: For 30s, your Stacking skills are enhanced and grant you 1 more stack with each hit.

name: Judgment
description: For 4s, Ruin skills always trigger the 4 stack effect, regardless of the actual number of stacks cast upon foes.

name: Moon
description: Cooldown -10% and MP Recovery Speed increase +20% for 30s.

name: Star
description: Recovers 100% MP. Remaining skills Cooldown -15% except for Awakening, Movement, and Stand Up skills.

name: Royal
description: Instantly gain two Tarot cards.

name: Wheel of Fortune
description: The Cooldown of the next skill decreases by 100%.

name: Call of Destiny
description: Throw a card at the target location to inflict damage and launch foes into the air.

name: Unlimited Shuffle
description: Throw a stack of cards at the target location to inflict damage and launch foes into the air. The foes are then slammed onto the ground, inflicting damage.

name: Return
description: Throw a card toward the target location to inflict damage and counter. Use the skill again to slam foes into the ground and inflict damage.

name: Mysterious Stampede
description: Quickly move left and return, inflicting damage both times.

name: Dark Resurrection
description: Throw cards at the target location and summon a Demon that inflicts damage.

name: Evoke
description: Cast a magick circle at the target location. Use the skill again to inflict damage to foes.

name: Quadra Accelerate
description: Throw cards at the target location 4 times to inflict damage.

name: Scratch Dealer
description: Dash toward the target location and inflict damage. Use the skill again to strike downward and inflict damage.

name: Spiral Edge
description: Leap toward the the target location while throwing a card to inflict damage.

name: Dance of Spineflower
description: Throw a flurry of cards while moving towards the target, inflicting damage. Use the skill again to return to your original position.

name: Checkmate
description: Quickly throw cards toward the target location, inflicting damage.

name: Stream of Edge
description: Open two portal gates at the target location, inflicting damage on all foes in between.

name: Infinity Shower
description: Throw cards down at the target location, inflicting damage.

name: Celestial Rain
description: Call down a rain of cards at the target location to inflict damage. Airborne foes recieve additional damage and are slammed onto the ground.

name: Four of a Kind
description: Throw four cards at the target location, inflicting damage and knocking back foes.

name: Serendipity
description: Fan out cards at the target location twice to inflict damage and knock foes away.

name: Secret Garden
description: Instantly inflict damage to nearby foes. Foes with 4 stacks are slammed onto the ground.

name: Deathbound
description: Summon the Card of Death, inflicting damage and knocking foes away. Damage increases based on number of stacks.

name: Prismatic Mirror
description: Summon a stack of enormous cards at the target location, inflicting damage. The cards then explode and knock back foes, inflicting damage.
